gw.plugin.account

Interface ICollateral

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ICollateral
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Interface for plugins that returns how to deal with Collateral Cash requirements

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean createCashRequirementCharge()
      Whether collateral should create a new charge to force cash requirement compliance
      java.util.Date getCollateralChargeDate(CollateralRequirement collateralRequirement)
      Determine the date that the collateralRequirementCharge should be effective on
      CollateralRequirement[] getCollateralRequirementsSorted(Collateral collateral)
      Get an ordered list of collateral requirements
      void handleDepositRequirement(PlcyBillingInstruction plcyBillingInstruction)
      Deal with the plugin requirement
      void paySegregatedCashRequirements(Collateral collateral, MonetaryAmount totalCashAtCollateral)
      Pay the segregated cash requirements
